scene1.title: The Signal in the Sky
scene1.scenario: It's been weeks since the world went quiet. No networks. No broadcasts. Tonight, a single beam of light pulses from the distant mountains, piercing the clouds.

choices.content: You pack a bag and set out toward the signal before dawn.
choices.result: Your journey begins through abandoned roads, your heart heavy with hope.

choices.content: You climb to your rooftop with binoculars and begin taking notes.
choices.result: You spot figures moving in patterns near the light source — too coordinated to be random.

scene2.title: Crossing the Wastes
scene2.scenario: The highway is cracked and overgrown. You pass collapsed overpasses and rusted-out cars. A faint humming noise begins to trail you.

choices.content: You duck into a gas station and listen closely.
choices.result: An old emergency radio crackles to life with a coded message.

choices.content: You ignore the sound and press on toward the mountains.
choices.result: Night falls. You see the light beam intensify as if reacting to your movement.

scene3.title: Patterns and Paranoia
scene3.scenario: The signal pulses again, and this time, something responds — a rhythmic flicker from a nearby hilltop. You realize you may not be the only one watching.

choices.content: You grab your flashlight and make your way up the hill under cover of night.
choices.result: You find a backpack full of maps and a journal that ends mid-sentence.

choices.content: You use mirrors and a flashlight to respond in Morse code.
choices.result: The beam in the mountains shifts — and now it points directly at your building.

scene4.title: The Threshold
scene4.scenario: Whether you traveled far or stayed and observed, you now stand on the edge of something vast. The light pulses steadily. A door-shaped silhouette appears before you.

choices.content: You take a deep breath and step through the threshold.
choices.result: A warm glow surrounds you as everything fades to white. You feel... remembered.

choices.content: You step back, uncertain if the world is ready for what lies beyond.
choices.result: The beam vanishes. Silence returns. But something has changed inside you.
